markdownRemark.html: On the edge of the world-famous People’s Square in the very heart of Shanghai lies the latest WeCare WC creation. Staged in the historical public restroom at No. 10 Wusheng Road (built in 1957), the project is a gorgeous retrofit of the pre-existing facilities; including an Accessible Room on the first floor and a Nursing Room on the second floor.

frontmatter.title: WeCare WC Lands in People’s Square
